name: Time Escapade
description:
Time Escapade is a impregnable prison outside of time and space, And the only one who can help Klaus as he tries to escape is himself.  Use the time machines to cooperate with your past selves in this platform puzzle. 

Will he be able to escape? Or is his future doomed to not exist?

Credits: 

Eduardo Petrópolis (Art Design) - https://kerbeks.itch.io/

João Pedro Saiago(Art Design) - https://jpsaiago.itch.io/

Raphael Duarte(Game Design)

Pedro Henrique(Coding an Sound Design)

Controls:

Walk with directionals.

Jump with spacebar.

Press W to interact with objects.

Have fun.
